page.content: induction and assesment unit for an initial period of 3 months before moving on to one of the two treatment units.Depending on their response,their next move is to the open unit where the process of re-introduction to the community,work experience and so on is undertaken.Barnardo's help to intergrate leavers through fostering.A programme of formal education is provided and it has proved possible to enter pupils to C.S.E."O"and "A"level examinations and there have been a number of successes. Glenthorne stands in a highly developed residential area,and while it was being built there were many public protest meetings.Continuing disquite led to the formation of an Advisory Committee who meet regularly to discuss matters which are of concern to the local community.
